title: Maggie's Men
description: Maggie West has a knack for attracting trouble, but this time she's attracted the perfect man. The love is instant, powerful, and unprecedented for Maggie, but it's not without roadblocks. As the saying goes: when it rains, it pours. Maggie has to fend off two other interested men while pursuing Mr. Perfect. Not only that, but a sudden cancer diagnosis is sure to complicate things. As things steam up with her love life, she must keep it all together or risk losing it allâ€¦
author: Leanna Harrow
